body:
Hello @thoo! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/frame.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/core/frame.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/reshape/pivot.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/core/reshape/pivot.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/io/json/normalize.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/io/json/normalize.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/io/parsers.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/io/parsers.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tseries/offsets.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/tseries/offsets.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/util/testing.py`](https://github.com/thoo/pandas/blob/681d9191d09843ffa248fe27dfb677e9683e3f82/pandas/util/testing.py) !

@thoo I think in this case it makes more sense to change the order of the parameters, as you did initially. But let's do that in a separate PR, just leave the other changes here.
I created #23612 to address the changes in `to_string` and `to_html`.

thanks @thoo nice work!

@datapythonista is this check now automatic in code_checks? (if not, pls create an issue for this, if you don't already).

@jreback I'm adding the docstring checks that are ready to #23614 which still requires some work.

I'll add the validation of the order the parameters, but there too it'll still fail, until #23614 is merged.
